questions.question: Which capital city features the iconic Sagrada Familia, a basilica designed by renowned architect Antoni Gaudí?
questions.context: Construction of this architectural marvel started in 1882 and remains ongoing, making it one of the most unique UNESCO sites.

questions.question: Where can you find the Burj Khalifa, the tallest structure and building in the world as of 2010?
questions.context: This record-breaking skyscraper is a symbol of modern engineering and has an observation deck on the 148th floor.

questions.question: Which site is home to the legendary battle believed to have inspired J.R.R. Tolkien, located near the River Somme?
questions.context: The Battle of Vimy Ridge in 1917 was a defining moment for Canadian forces during World War I.

questions.question: What museum located in a former railway station holds the largest collection of Impressionist masterpieces?
questions.context: This Parisian museum is famed for artworks by Monet, Degas, and Van Gogh and was inaugurated in 1986.

questions.question: Which ancient site, once part of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World, can be found near Izmir, Turkey?
questions.context: Dedicated to the goddess Artemis, this temple was rebuilt three times before its final destruction in 401 AD.
